snippet.title: Pokémon Yellow: Cramorant Edition - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
As a lifelong Pokémon fan, when I discovered the Pokémon disassembles, I thought about how cool it would be if I were to make my own ROM Hack and have it feature one of my favorite Pokémon. 7 months later, and here we are.

Pokémon Yellow: Cramorant Edition is a ROM hack of Pokémon Yellow which replaces the following Pikachu with Cramorant! All associated sprites, graphics, text, and sounds for Pikachu have been edited to fit with Cramorant!

Some additional features include: extra Pokémon, better Pokémon trainer variety, more wild Pokémon to be encountered, slightly more challenging trainers, a few additional events and locations, some beta and unused content, Super Game Boy compatibility, every Pokémon obtainable in-game, various bug fixes, and much more!

The official site and download page for Pokémon Yellow: Cramorant Edition can be found at:
https://github.com/Cram-o-dev/cramorantedition

To play Cramorant Edition:
1. Click the Github link and go to Releases - v1.0 Full Release
2. Scroll down to Assets and download the "pokecram.bps" file.
3. Patch the .bps file onto a clean, English ROM of Pokémon Yellow. There are many online and downloadable ROM patchers that will apply the file to the ROM. If you don't know how to use one, Google is your friend. Also, if you aren't sure how to acquire a ROM of Pokémon Yellow, Google can help too.
4. Open your Gameboy or Gameboy Advance emulator and load the patched ROM. Alternatively, you can also load the ROM onto your Gameboy Flashcart and play on real hardware. Many Gameboy emulators can be found here: https://www.emulator-zone.com/doc.php/gameboy/
5. Enjoy!

Can also be downloaded here:
https://www.romhacking.net/hacks/7831/
1. Make sure you have a program that can extract .rar files like WinRAR or 7-Zip.
2. Extract the patch to wherever you want and follow step 3 above.

I'd like to give a huge thanks to the Pokémon Reverse Engineering Team (pret) for their disassembles of many Pokémon games. Cramorant Edition was created using the Pokémon Yellow disassembly as a base. I'd also like to thank the pret discord community for being incredibly helpful for guiding me and providing me with advice when I got stuck during hacking. As someone with absolutely no hacking or programming skills, I appreciate their willingness to help. Without them or the disassembly, this project wouldn't have been possible.

I'd also like to thank FrenchOrange for touching up some of the custom art and sprites, Vortyne for allowing me to use code from PureRGB, RainbowMetalPigeon for giving me lots of feedback, and finally Xillicis, JustRegularLuna, and PlagueVonKarma for writing coding tutorials on the disassembly wiki's which I used.

Trailer Music - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d8vXjBKnKD8

Pokémon is owned by Nintendo, Game Freak, and Creatures. Please support official releases.
